languages.text: "Помни — мы все виновны! Моя кровь не смоет порок с твоей души, как бы ты того ни жаждал{mf||а}. Император защища..." {n}Иеронимус едва успевает сложить руки в символ аквилы, прежде чем его тело оседает на пол с блаженной улыбкой на потрескавшихся губах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не питай иллюзий — мы все виновны! Моя кровь не смоет порок с твоей души, как бы ты того ни жаждал{mf||а}. Император защища..." {n}Иеронимус едва успевает сложить руки в символ аквилы, прежде чем его тело оседает на пол с блаженной улыбкой на потрескавшихся губах.{/n}

languages.text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

languages.text: 「我々全員が罪人なのだと覚えておくがいい！どれほどそう願っても、私の血があなたの魂の欠陥を洗い流すことは決してありません。皇帝のご加護を―」{n}ヒエロニムスはなんとか胸の前でアクィラの印を結ぶと、ひび割れた唇で満足した笑みを残し、地面に崩れ落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々全員が罪人なのだと覚えておくがいい！どれほどそう願っても、私の血があなたの魂の欠陥を洗い流すことは決してありません。皇帝のご加護を―」{n}ヒエロニムスはなんとか胸の前でアクィラの印を結ぶと、ひび割れた唇で満足した笑みを残し、地面に崩れ落ちた。{/n}

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas : nous sommes tous coupables ! Vous aurez beau vous accrocher à cette idée, mon sang ne lavera pas les fautes qui pèsent sur votre âme. L'Empereur pro... » {n}C'est à peine si Hiéronymus a le temps de faire le signe de l'Aquila sur sa poitrine avant que son corps ne s'effondre au sol, un sourire béat sur ses lèvres gercées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas : nous sommes tous coupables ! Vous aurez beau vous accrocher à cette idée, mon sang ne lavera pas les fautes qui pèsent sur votre âme. L'Empereur pro... » {n}C'est à peine si Hiéronymus a le temps de faire le signe de l'Aquila sur sa poitrine avant que son corps ne s'effondre au sol, un sourire béat sur ses lèvres gercées.{/n}

languages.text: “不要忘了，我们每个人都有罪！哪怕是我的鲜血，也无法洗刷你灵魂中的罪孽。哪怕你再怎么不肯承认，也无济于事。愿帝皇保——”{n}希罗尼穆斯还没来得及做好双头鹰的手势，他的身体就倒在了地上。他干裂的嘴唇上露出了至福的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不要忘了，我们每个人都有罪！哪怕是我的鲜血，也无法洗刷你灵魂中的罪孽。哪怕你再怎么不肯承认，也无济于事。愿帝皇保——”{n}希罗尼穆斯还没来得及做好双头鹰的手势，他的身体就倒在了地上。他干裂的嘴唇上露出了至福的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Vergesst nicht, dass wir alle schuldig sind! Mein Blut wäscht nicht die Fehler Eurer Seele fort, wie verzweifelt Ihr Euch das auch wünschen mögt. Der Imperator schü..." {n}Hieronymus kann kaum das Zeichen des Adlers auf seiner Brust machen, da stürzt sein Körper schon zu Boden, ein seliges Lächeln auf den rissigen Lippen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst nicht, dass wir alle schuldig sind! Mein Blut wäscht nicht die Fehler Eurer Seele fort, wie verzweifelt Ihr Euch das auch wünschen mögt. Der Imperator schü..." {n}Hieronymus kann kaum das Zeichen des Adlers auf seiner Brust machen, da stürzt sein Körper schon zu Boden, ein seliges Lächeln auf den rissigen Lippen.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Recuerde que todos tenemos culpa! Mi sangre no limpiará la corrupción de su alma, por muy {mf|desesperado|desesperada} que esté por que así sea. El Emperador prote...». {n}Hieronymus no termina de realizar el signo de Aquila sobre su pecho, pues su cuerpo se desploma sobre el suelo mientras sus labios agrietados muestran una sonrisa de alegría.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Recuerde que todos tenemos culpa! Mi sangre no limpiará la corrupción de su alma, por muy {mf|desesperado|desesperada} que esté por que así sea. El Emperador prote...». {n}Hieronymus no termina de realizar el signo de Aquila sobre su pecho, pues su cuerpo se desploma sobre el suelo mientras sus labios agrietados muestran una sonrisa de alegría.{/n}

languages.text: "Hepimizin suçlu olduğunu unutma! Aksini ne kadar istersen iste... Kanım, ruhunun yanlışlarını yıkayıp temizlemeyecek. İmparator ko..." {n}Hieronymus göğsüne Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor, ardından bedeni yere çöküyor. Çarpık dudaklarında huzurlu bir gülümseme var.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Remember that we are all guilty! My blood will not wash away the faults of your soul, however desperately you may wish it were otherwise. The Emperor prote—" {n}Hieronymus barely has time to make the sign of the Aquila over his chest before his body slumps to the ground with a blissful smile on his cracked lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hepimizin suçlu olduğunu unutma! Benim kanım, ne kadar aksini istersen iste, senin ruhunun yanlışlarını yıkayıp temizlemeyecek. İmparator ko..." {n}Hieronymus göğsüne Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapacak zamanı zar zor buluyor, ardından bedeni yere çöküyor. Çarpık dudaklarında huzurlu bir gülümseme var.{/n}
